name: IBMQRadar_Search_Automated
author: Jeffrey Everling
description: Check if observables are present in QRadar data.

configurationItems.name: search_timeout
configurationItems.description: Provide the search timeout in seconds (Default to 1 hour)

configurationItems.name: search_limit
configurationItems.description: The amount of days QRadar looks back to find the observable (Defaults to 1)

configurationItems.name: rs_switchover
configurationItems.description: The amount of hours QRadar waits until starting to use reference sets (Defaults to 24)

configurationItems.name: http_method_field
configurationItems.description: The field that contains the HTTP method for a web request

configurationItems.name: url_root_domain_field
configurationItems.description: The field that contains the root domain for a web request

configurationItems.name: url_fqdn_field
configurationItems.description: The field that contains the fqdn for a web request

configurationItems.name: url_field
configurationItems.description: The field that contains the url for a web request

configurationItems.name: computer_field
configurationItems.description: The field containing the computer name
